programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives try to identify a girl who is so traumatized after being raped that she cannot tell them her name.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler help a repeat rape victim (Jennifer Love Hewitt) stand up to her attacker; the investigation leads Benson to Los Angeles, where she meets a detective (Skeet Ulrich) with information that could help the victim get justice.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenage girl's death in a hit-and-run accident leads Benson and Stabler to a human trafficking ring; Cragen becomes frustrated by his crumbling precinct.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Benson and Stabler investigate a young woman's rape and murder, the case puts them in the line of fire and exposes a larger mystery that includes more victims.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler notices that Benson is bonding with Calvin, the boy left in her care; Fin and Munch must investigate when the name of Calvin's mother (Maria Bello) comes up during a rape investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Investigation into the death of a young boy leads to a gambling ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Following the deaths of three children, Fin realizes they were all "anchor babies" of immigrant families, and he reaches out to the Center of Immigrant Services.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler search for a man who is knowingly spreading HIV.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A lesbian-rights activist (Kathy Griffin) claims a woman's death was the result of police neglect; when more women from the activist's group are attacked, it becomes clear that someone has a plan to bring down the group.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Several young prostitutes are found dead with homemade prayer cards attached to their bodies; Benson is forced to make a difficult decision.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: New York's SVU agents Fin and Rollins help track down a serial killer who rapes his victims; Burgess gets an opportunity to prove herself; Lindsay brings Halstead as her date to her high school reunion.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Halstead's badge is revoked when Lonnie Rodiger is found dead; Severide (Taylor Kinney) and Clarke (Peter Mills) find Dr. Elliot's torso; Sumner (Sydney Tamiia Poitier) tries to prove herself; Lindsay shares a moment with Severide.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Atwater settles into his new role; Lindsay turns to Voight for help; Jin is confronted about his meetings with Stillwell.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The intelligence team works to find those responsible for Burgess' wounds; a search of the house provides valuable information.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight and the team help retired Cmdr. Perry extract his nephew from a corrupt unit; Lindsay struggles to stay clean; a woman from Olinsky's past contacts him.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight wants to make his former cellmate a confidential informant as the unit tries to take down a big cocaine supplier and local dealers; Burgess makes a decision about her relationship with Ruzek; Roman works with Firehouse 51 to fund a wedding.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Ruzek and Burgess' secret begins to have severe implications for their police work; a series of deadly acts of vandalism causes tensions to run high in the insular neighborhood of Canaryville; Atwater tries to reach out to his brother.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Ruzek and Burgess discover a child walking alone in the middle of the street, and when they take her home, they discover that her entire family has been murdered; Upton is approached with a job offer from the FBI.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The team investigates a rash of car jackings and finds the truth is more complicated than it seems; Burgess makes a discovery about a previous case that will change her life forever.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The shocking murder of a young pregnant woman leads the team on a desperate hunt for the killer, revealing something even darker than expected; Burgess has to make a tough decision about Makayla.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The unit scrambles to search for one of its own who is in grave danger.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight and the team delve into a cold case in search of clues to solve a shocking new crime; with its focus on buried memories, the case sparks concern for Burgess and Ruzek about Makayla's mental healing.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A tragic crime leads the team closer to the Beck family and their deadly ideology; Ruzek makes progress infiltrating the Becks, earning Samantha and Richard's trust with a bold move.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Burgess works an extra shift at the 13th District and gets caught in the middle of a drive-by attack on refugees; the team works together to track down the shooter and uncover the true motive behind the attack.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: On his 11th birthday Harry Potter learns he is the orphaned son of two wizards and is invited to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft & Wizardry where he embarks on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: Harry Potter returns to Hogwarts for his second year but dreadful things begin to happen at the school. Harry, Hermione and Ron do everything wizardly possible to solve this deadly mystery.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler speak to the daughter of a powerful couple who were found murdered in their bedroom.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler must determine a murder victim's actual identity when the presumed victim turns up alive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate when a 10-year-old girl goes missing.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When secret information about suspected terrorists goes missing from a secure Department of Defense container at the site of a fire, Sam and Callen must go under cover to investigate.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When Sam gets a distress code from his son Aiden saying his school is being taken over by an extremist group, the team rushes to San Francisco to free the hostages and protect Aiden.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: The second installment of the Fantastic Beasts series featuring the adventures of Magizoologist Newt Scamander.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore must assist Newt Scamander and his partners as Grindelwald begins to lead an army to eliminate all Muggles.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: On his 11th birthday Harry Potter learns he is the orphaned son of two wizards and is invited to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft & Wizardry where he embarks on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: Harry Potter returns to Hogwarts for his second year but dreadful things begin to happen at the school. Harry, Hermione and Ron do everything wizardly possible to solve this deadly mystery.
